issue.title: [C++] Unpin CMake version in MSVC build toolchain
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1386](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1386). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that CMake 3.9.1 has been released with the bug fix we need (from ARROW-1294), we can remove the 3.8.0 version pin.
